get_started.heading: Welcome Students!
get_started.desc:
We are glad that you have signed-up to this program and joined us in this exciting journey of nurturing an experience of learning, skilling and innovation for the young people. As you are aware you will be playing a role of student for the participants in their learning journey.

This portal gives you an experience of learning modules and important resources for supporting the participants. You can also register and track progress of your teams using the dashboard.

Your journey as a teacher/mentor will involve the following key milestones:

  • Step-1: Take Pre-Survey
  • Step-2: Complete the course and reading material
  • Step-3: Register the teams
  • Step-4: Support the participants in completing the learning journey.
  • Step-5: Support the participants in challenge/idea submission.
  • Step-6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!

teacher_get_started.heading: Welcome Guide Teacher!
teacher_get_started.desc:
We are delighted that you have signed up for this program and have joined us on this journey of nurturing problem solving and innovation in youth. As you are already aware, you will be playing the role of a guide teacher to the students for the duration of the course.

The portal includes various information modules and resources that will help you and your students on their learning journeys.

Your journey as a guide teacher will include the following key milestones

  1. Register yourself on the portal and take the pre-survey.
  2. Understand the program and the tech platform.
  3. Identify teams and register them on the portal.
  4. Arrange access to digital devices for students.
  5. Support the students on their learning journey.
  6. Ensure teams submit their final ideas on the portal.
  7. Complete the post survey.
  8. Download teacherтАЩs certificate.
  9. Instruct and support the students to download student certificates.

We hope you and the students have a great time doing this program.

We wish you all the best!
